title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: CREATURE FROM THE HAUNTED SEA & LITTLE SHOP OF HORRORS

sources.title: DRIVEINSHOWCREATUREHAUNTEDSEALITTLESHOP
sources.description: COMPLETE DVD. Contains the menu with poster art and drive in style audio, the opening previews, two movies, the intermission in between, and the goodnight clip. To make your dvd, download the zipped folder, open it extract the VIDEO_TS folder, then burn the VIDEO TS folder on a disc and you're done. Just take the disc into the player, grab soda, candy, chips, and a beer or two, and watch! I've also uploaded the files outside the .zip so they can be viewed here on this site. This dvd features a Roger Corman double bill, CREATURE FROM THE HAUNTED SEA and LITTLE SHOP OF HORRORS. Enjoy the show!
